edu.caltech.nanodb.queryeval

Class AbstractPlannerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.caltech.nanodb.queryeval.AbstractPlannerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Planner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CostBasedJoinPlanner, SimplestPlanner

    public abstract class AbstractPlannerImpl
extends Object
implements Planner
    This class contains implementation details that are common across all query planners. Planners are of course free to implement these operations separately, but just about all planners have some common functionality, and it's very helpful to implement that functionality once in an abstract base class.
